events.name: Lithium-Ion Battery (LIB) Market and Supply Chain Analysis
events.wd_label: Lithium-Ion Battery (LIB) Market and Supply Chain Analysis
events.wd_description: This event examines the growing market for lithium-ion batteries (LIB) driven by the demand for electric vehicles, consumer electronics, and energy storage. It highlights potential problems in the supply chain of raw materials, environmental and social impacts of mining, and the importance of recycling end-of-life batteries.
events.description: This event examines the growing market for lithium-ion batteries (LIB) driven by the demand for electric vehicles, consumer electronics, and energy storage. It highlights potential problems in the supply chain of raw materials, environmental and social impacts of mining, and the importance of recycling end-of-life batteries.

events.name: Market growth
events.wd_description: Analyzing the increasing market share of lithium-ion batteries due to rising demand for electric vehicles, consumer electronics, and energy storage.
events.description: Analyzing the increasing market share of lithium-ion batteries due to rising demand for electric vehicles, consumer electronics, and energy storage.

events.name: Electric Vehicles
events.wd_description: Exploring the impact of growing demand for electric vehicles on the lithium-ion battery market.
events.description: Exploring the impact of growing demand for electric vehicles on the lithium-ion battery market.

events.name: Consumer electronics
events.wd_description: Investigating the role of consumer electronics in driving the demand for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Investigating the role of consumer electronics in driving the demand for lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Energy storage
events.wd_description: Examining the impact of energy storage systems on the growth of the lithium-ion battery market.
events.description: Examining the impact of energy storage systems on the growth of the lithium-ion battery market.

events.name: Supply chain issues
events.wd_description: Highlighting potential problems in the supply chain of raw materials needed for lithium-ion battery manufacture, including scarcity and geopolitical risks.
events.description: Highlighting potential problems in the supply chain of raw materials needed for lithium-ion battery manufacture, including scarcity and geopolitical risks.

events.name: Lithium supply
events.wd_description: Addressing the challenges associated with the supply of lithium, a critical metal for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Addressing the challenges associated with the supply of lithium, a critical metal for lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Cobalt supply
events.wd_description: Investigating the supply chain issues related to cobalt, focusing on scarcity and trade policies.
events.description: Investigating the supply chain issues related to cobalt, focusing on scarcity and trade policies.

events.name: Graphite supply
events.wd_description: Evaluating the supply of graphite for lithium-ion batteries and the associated challenges.
events.description: Evaluating the supply of graphite for lithium-ion batteries and the associated challenges.

events.name: Environmental and social impacts
events.wd_description: Analyzing the environmental and social impacts of mining the raw materials needed for lithium-ion batteries as production ramps up.
events.description: Analyzing the environmental and social impacts of mining the raw materials needed for lithium-ion batteries as production ramps up.

events.name: Environmental impact
events.wd_description: Investigating the environmental consequences of mining lithium, cobalt, and graphite for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Investigating the environmental consequences of mining lithium, cobalt, and graphite for lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Social impact
events.wd_description: Examining the social impacts of mining activities related to lithium-ion batteries, including labor conditions and community effects.
events.description: Examining the social impacts of mining activities related to lithium-ion batteries, including labor conditions and community effects.

events.name: Recycling benefits
events.wd_description: Discussing the expected benefits of recycling end-of-life lithium-ion batteries on the global supply chain and environmental impact.
events.description: Discussing the expected benefits of recycling end-of-life lithium-ion batteries on the global supply chain and environmental impact.

events.name: Recycling technologies
events.wd_description: Analyzing innovations in recycling technologies that can help recover high-value materials from end-of-life lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Analyzing innovations in recycling technologies that can help recover high-value materials from end-of-life lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Regulatory impact
events.wd_description: Evaluating the impact of environmental regulations on the recycling of lithium-ion batteries and their end-of-life management.
events.description: Evaluating the impact of environmental regulations on the recycling of lithium-ion batteries and their end-of-life management.

events.name: Proactive Regulations for End of Life Batteries
events.description: Proactive regulations are necessary to ensure that end-of-life batteries are recycled instead of ending up in landfills, which can supply a significant fraction of the materials needed for new LIB.
